title: The Pirate's gold
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: A dying pirate hides treasure in an old woman’s cottage. Many years later, when her son is in great need, it comes to light. Cast includes Florence Lawrence, Arthur V. Johnson, Tony O’Sullivan, mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
